channel.title: CVE Feed for gohugoio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for gohugoio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32875|2024-08-02T02:20:35.602Z -- gohugoio -- hugo
item.description: Hugo is a static site generator. Starting in version 0.123.0 and prior to version 0.125.3, title arguments in Markdown for links and images not escaped in internal render hooks. Hugo users who are impacted are those who have these hooks enabled and do not trust their Markdown content files. The issue is patched in v0.125.3. As a workaround, replace the templates with user defined templates or disable the internal templates.

As a workaround, replace the templates with user defined templates or disable the internal templates.
